title: Are Carjackers Using Discarded Shirts as Bait to Lure Victims?
subtitle: News reports conflated a genuine incident of human trafficking with a completely unrelated claim that traffickers used shirts on windshields as bait.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A new tactic used by abductors and carjackers is to leave a shirt on a windshield to lure women out of their cars.
